title: Buddhist Dharma Venerable Shravasti Dhammika - Dhammapada
description:
** Venerable Shravasti Dhammika **
 <a href="
http://www.buddhanet.net/bodh_gaya/dhammika.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.buddhanet.net/bodh_gaya/dhammika.htm</a>	

Venerable Shravasti Dhammika is a distinguished lecturer and Buddhist monk from Australia. He has spoken on Buddhism and Asian religions in universities and on television and radio in Australia and throughout Asia. Basic Buddhist Concepts,The Buddhist Scriptures, About Monks and Nuns, Rebirth, Vegetarianism, Becoming a Buddhist, Buddhism and the God-idea, and many more are answered by Ven. Dhammika.

Ven Dhammika is the author of many popular books on Buddhism:

    All About Buddhism
    Good Question, Good Answer
    Questions on: What is Buddhism?
    Matreceta&#039;s Hymn to the Buddha
    Buddha Vacana
    Daily readings from the sacred literature of Buddhism
    Navel of the Earth
    Buddha and His Disciples
    Middle Land Middle Way
    The Edicts of King Asoka
    Encounters with Buddhism
    Sayings of the Buddha
    Rahula Leads the Way
    The Buddha and His Friends
